member.summary: Runs the email address verification, up to the specified level, as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
member.param: A Verification containing both inputs and, after the asynchronous execution completes, the outputs of the verification process.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.BeginRun(Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous verification of the given Verification, up to the specified level.
member.remarks: This method uses the IAsyncResult pattern for anynchronous purposes; to use an event-based pattern please see the VerifyAsync method and its overloads.
member.param: A Verification containing both inputs and, after the asynchronous execution completes, the outputs of the verification process.
The method that is executed when the execution performed by BeginRun completes.
An object that contains any additional user-defined data.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous call.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.BeginRun(Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification,Cobisi.EmailVerify.ComponentModel.IVerificationStrategy{Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.VerificationStepResult,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings},System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous verification of the given Verification, up to the specified level.
member.remarks: This method uses the IAsyncResult pattern for anynchronous purposes; to use an event-based pattern please see the VerifyAsync method and its overloads.
member.param: A Verification containing both inputs and, after the asynchronous execution completes, the outputs of the verification process.
The method that is executed when the execution performed by BeginRun completes.
An object that contains any additional user-defined data.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous call.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.BeginRun(Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.BeginRun(Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup,Cobisi.EmailVerify.ComponentModel.IVerificationStrategy{Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.VerificationStepResult,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings},System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary:
Verifies a set of e-mail addresses in parallel using a VerificationGroup, which represents a collection of related Verification.
The VerificationGroup type implements a highly optimized algorithm that internally sorts the contained tasks in order to achieve the best possible degree of parallelism.
member.param: A VerificationGroup which contains the collection of e-mail address verifications to perform.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.EndRun(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Handles the end of an asynchronous verification started with the BeginRun method.
member.remarks: This method uses the IAsyncResult pattern for anynchronous purposes; to use an event-based pattern please see the VerifyAsync method and its overloads.
member.param: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous call to end.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.CancelRun(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Cancels a pending asynchronous verification or verification group started with the BeginRun method.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.DefaultSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the default settings for the component.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.MaxDegreeOfParallelism
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent validations a single VerificationEngine instance can handle. The setting exists predominantly to provide control for advanced usage.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEngine.UseSynchronizationContext
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution. The default is false, meaning events are fired directly, with no thread marshalling.
member.remarks: Use this property to provide the user interface thread affinity that some applications require. For example, a Windows Forms application may be registered as a singleton service object. In this case, all calls into the service must run on the Windows Forms thread. The default case, in which UseSynchronizationContext is set to , synchronizes all calls to the service to run in whatever thread the component happens to run on, with no guarantee of being the user interface thread. In that case, you may want to set UseSynchronizationContext to and have the component to fire events on the user interface thread instead.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.LicensingManager
member.summary: Allows to configure the license key for the product.
member.remarks: License keys can be retrieved from the clients area on the Cobisi website at https://cobisi.com/client-area and can be applied to purchased, digitally-signed copies of the products only.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.LicensingManager.SetLicenseKey(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the license key for the component.
member.remarks: Please note that this static method must be invoked before using any other functionality of the library: ideally, in the initialization module of your application. License keys can be retrieved from the clients area on the Cobisi website and can be applied to purchased, digitally-signed copies of the products only.

member.summary: Returns the last level of validation the engine considered.

member.summary: Returns a sorted, enumerable collection with all the levels of validation the engine considered for a specific email address.

member.summary: An indexer which returns the status of the first occurrence of a particular verification level.

member.summary: Contains the status code and the eventual unhandled exceptions for a particular verification level.

member.summary: Initialize a new instance, with an initial empty list of unhandled exceptions.

member.summary: Initialize a new instance.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevelResult.UnhandledExceptions
member.summary: Gets the unhandled exceptions throw during the verification process for a particular level.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevelResult.Status
member.summary: Gets the status code returned for a particular level. The setter for this property should only be used by custom extensions to the main email validation pipeline.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag
member.summary: Represents an object repository which allows to save and retrieve the component state while it validates email addresses.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: This method is currently not supported.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)
member.summary: Serializes the known state bag properties of this instance into an XML document fragment.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.Result
member.summary: Returns the result of the verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.CurrentLevel
member.summary: Gets the current verification level for this verification state.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.EmailAddress
member.summary: Gets the plain email address, without comments and folding white space (FWS) sequences.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.EmailAddressLocalPart
member.summary: Gets the local part of the email address.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.AsciiEmailAddressDomainPart
member.summary: Gets the domain part of the email address in its ASCII representation.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.EmailAddressDomainPart
member.summary: Gets the domain part of the email address, with no conversion applied. See for the ASCII representation of this value.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.HasInternationalMailboxName
member.summary: Returns true if the email address has a non-ASCII local part, false otherwise. If this detail can't be determined, the return value is null.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.HasInternationalDomainName
member.summary: Returns true if the email address has a non-ASCII domain name, false otherwise. If this detail can't be determined, the return value is null.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.Comments
member.summary: Gets an array of comment strings extracted from the email address, if any. If the email address being validated does not have any comments, returns an empty array.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.SyntaxFailureIndex
member.summary: Returns the index of the first syntactic error of the input email address, if any. If the email address is syntactically valid, the return value is null.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.IsRoleAccount
member.summary: Returns true if the local part of the email address is a well-known role account, false otherwise. If this detail can't be determined, the return value is null.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.IsDisposableEmailAddress
member.summary: Returns true if the email address is temporary/disposable, false otherwise. If this detail can't be determined, the return value is null.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.MailExchangers
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of mail exchangers (if any) the component collected while validating the email address, provided the chosen level of validation supported this feature.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.SmtpDialog
member.summary: Returns the SMTP dialog transcript for the validation or null if not present.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStateBag.UnhandledExceptions
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of exceptions which have been thrown while performing the validation.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.ComponentException
member.summary: The base type for specific exceptions thrown by the component.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.VerificationGroupIsReadOnlyException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the component detects an attempt to modify a verification task group while its validation is in progress.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Strategies.SocketConnectingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the ProxyBinding event of the VerificationEngine class and allows to specify different proxy servers to be used for connecting to external IP end points, based on the running Verification.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Strategies.SocketConnectingEventArgs.Verification
member.summary: Gets the running Verification.
member.remarks: The properties of this object are often used to determine which proxy server to use among a list of available ones.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Strategies.SocketConnectingEventArgs.Settings
member.summary: Gets the settings for the verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Strategies.SocketConnectingEventArgs.TargetEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the target IP end point that the component is going to connect to, including the target IP address and port.
member.remarks: This object is often used to determine which proxy server to use among a list of available ones.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Strategies.SocketConnectingEventArgs.SocketConnector
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy server to use while connecting to the target end point.
member.remarks: The default value for this property is retrieved from the Proxy property of the VerificationEngine class.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Strategies.SocketConnectingEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the ProxyBinding event of the VerificationEngine class.
member.param: The source of the event.
A SocketConnectingEventArgs object that contains the event data.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.LicenseException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the component detects an invalid license.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.LocalEndPointBindingEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the LocalEndPointBinding event of the VerificationEngine class.
member.param: The source of the event.
A LocalEndPointBindingEventArgs object that contains the event data.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.VerificationStep
member.summary: Provides base functionalities for verification steps.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Dns.MailExchanger
member.summary: Represents a mail exchanger for a given domain.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Dns.MailExchanger.HostName
member.summary: The DNS host name of the mail exchanger.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Dns.MailExchanger.Addresses
member.summary: Gets the IP addresses of the mail exchanger.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Dns.MailExchanger.Preference
member.summary: The mail exchanger preference (if any), eventually read from the DNS MX record.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpCommand
member.summary: Represents a command sent from the component to an external mail exchanger, during an SMTP dialog.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpMessage
member.summary: Represents a message exchanged (sent or received) during an SMTP dialog.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpCommand.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the message.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpCommand.RawLine
member.summary: Gets the raw line of the message, as sent by the component.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpDialog
member.summary: Represents an SMTP dialog.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpDialog.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation for the entire SMTP dialog transcript.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpDialog.Messages
member.summary: Gets the messages (commands and replies) exchanged during an SMTP dialog, ordered by their transmission/reception time.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReply
member.summary: Represents a reply received from an external mail exchanger during an SMTP dialog.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReply.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of all the lines of the reply.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReply.ReplyLines
member.summary: Gets the collection of lines pertaining to the reply.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReply.IsSuccessful
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the reply is successful or not.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReply.IsPartial
member.summary: Returns true if the SMTP reply requires additional lines to be complete and meaningful.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine
member.summary: Represents a single line of an SMTP reply.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the SMTP reply line.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.Code
member.summary: Gets the raw SMTP status code of the line.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.MoreLinesFollow
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the component expects one or more lines after this one or not.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.RawLine
member.summary: Gets the raw line of the reply, as received by the external mail exchanger.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.Message
member.summary: Gets the message part of the reply line.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpStage
member.summary: Specifies the different stages of the SMTP protocol where dialog exceptions may occur.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpStage.BeforeHelo
member.summary: The first stage of the SMTP dialog, before sending the HELO greeting.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpStage.Helo
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the HELO command.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpStage.MailFrom
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the MAIL FROM command.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpStage.RcptTo
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the RCPT TO command.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.Smtp.SmtpStage.Quit
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the QUIT command.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.VerificationStepResult
member.summary: Contains the possible results a verification step can provide upon terminating its execution.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.VerificationStepResult.Continue
member.summary: Instructs the verification engine to keep processing the email address under test.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSteps.VerificationStepResult.Halt
member.summary: Instructs the verification engine to terminate the processing of the email address under test.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings
member.summary: Contains the settings which rule the entire email validation process.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: This method is currently not implemented.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)
member.summary: This method is currently not implemented.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.MailboxInspectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for the inspection of the mailbox to complete. Inspections lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for mailbox inspection is 60 seconds (1 minute).

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.CatchAllValidationTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for the catch-all verification to complete. Verification lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for catch-all verification is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.SmtpConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for the SMTP server to accepts a connection. Connection attempts lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for SMTP connections is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.HttpsConnectionTimeout
member.summary: The timeout for an external HTTPS server to accepts a connection. Connection attempts lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for HTTPS connections is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.LocalHostFqdn
member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the local host, used to connect to external SMTP servers while validating e-mail addresses. The default value for this property is the resolved DNS name for the local host.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.LocalSenderAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the local sender email address, used to connect to external SMTP servers while validating e-mail addresses. The default value for this property is postmaster@host, where host is the value retrieved from LocalHostFqdn.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.LocalEndPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the local endpoint, mostly used to connect to the external SMTP servers while validating email addresses. The default value for this property allows the component to use the first available IP address and port. The Enterprise Edition of the component allows to change the local endpoint and possibly cycle among a list of available IP addresses by way of the LocalEndPointBinding event.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.AllowDomainLiterals
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows domain literals within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts domain literals.If this value is set to false, every domain literal would state in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.AllowInternationalDomainNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows international domain names (IDN) labels within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts international domain names.If this value is set to false, every international domain name would state in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.AllowInternationalMailboxNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows international mailbox names within the e-mail addresses it validates, according to RFC 5336. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts international mailbox names.If this value is set to false, every international mailbox name would state in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.AllowComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows comments within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts comments.If this value is set to false, every comment would state in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.AllowQuotedStrings
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows quoted strings (and, consequently, quoted pairs) within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts quoted strings (and quoted pairs).If this value is set to false, every quoted string would state in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.AllowFoldingWhiteSpaces
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows folding white spaces (FWS) within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts folding white spaces.If this value is set to false, every white space would state in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.TreatDeaFailuresAsFatal
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component will stop processing email addresses that fail while validating in the DeaDomain or in the DeaMailExchanger validation levels or will keep verifying the upper validation levels as well. The default value is true, meaning a disposable email address will make the entire validation fail with the DomainIsWellKnownDea or with the MailExchangerIsWellKnownDea status codes.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.TreatRoleAccountFailuresAsFatal
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component will stop processing email addresses that fail while validating in the RoleAccount validation level or will keep verifying the upper validation levels as well. The default value is false, meaning a role account email address will not stop the whole validation.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.SameDomainConnectionDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay for SMTP connections made against the same domain. Verifications which employ level Smtp or greater and made against the same domain will wait this interval between a connection and the subsequent, in order to lighten the external server load. The default delay for SMTP connections made against the same domain is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.SameMailExchangerConnectionDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay for SMTP connections made against the same mail exchanger host. Verifications which employ level Smtp or greater and made against the same mail exchanger host will wait this interval between a connection and the subsequent, in order to lighten the external server load. The default delay for SMTP connections made against the same mail exchanger host is 30 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.SameMailExchangerAddressConnectionDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay for SMTP connections made against the same mail exchanger IP address. Verifications which employ level Smtp or greater and made against the same mail exchanger IP address will wait this interval between a connection and the subsequent, in order to lighten the external server load. The default delay for SMTP connections made against the same mail exchanger IP address is 1 minute.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.DnsQueryMaxRetriesCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times to retry querying the DNS when a connection failure or a timeout occurs. The default is 3 retries.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.DnsReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed time to receive a response from the configured DNS server(s). Queries lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for DNS queries is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.DnsSendTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed time to send a request to the configured DNS server(s). Queries lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for DNS queries is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.DnsServers
member.summary: Gets the editable list of IP addresses of the DNS servers used during the verification phase. The default IP addresses are retrieved from the current system configuration.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.UseYahooWebServices
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component should use the Yahoo! identity web services to detect invalid email IDs or should use the standard SMTP-based email validation strategy. The default value is true, meaning the component uses the Yahoo! identity web services, if needed.If this value is set to false, the component does not use the Yahoo! identity web services, even if the target email address is provided by Yahoo!

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings.SocketConnector
member.summary: Gets or sets a proxy object used by the component for establishing connections to external machines, like Internet mail exchangers. While EmailVerify.NET allows to use custom proxy types that derive from the IProxyClient interface, the Cobisi ProxyClient.NET library offers ready-made SOCKS 4, SOCKS 4a, SOCKS 5 and HTTP-CONNECT proxy server support and can be easily integrated by way of the same interface. The default value is null, meaning there is no configured proxy.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the VerificationStarted event of the VerificationEngine class.
member.param: The source of the event.
A VerificationEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.LocalEndPointBindingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the LocalEndPointBinding event of the VerificationEngine class and allows to specify different local endpoints to be used for connecting to external hosts, based on the running Verification.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.LocalEndPointBindingEventArgs.Verification
member.summary: Gets the running Verification.
member.remarks: The properties of this object are often used to determine which IP address to use among a list of available ones.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.LocalEndPointBindingEventArgs.LocalEndPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the local endpoint (an IP address and, optionally, a port) to use while binding locally, just before connecting to an external host.
member.remarks: The default value for this property is retrieved from the LocalEndPoint property of the default VerificationEngine settings class.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.ConfigurationException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the component detects invalid data in its configuration.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus
member.summary: Provides enumerated values that specify the supported statuses of an e-mail address verification.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.CustomFailure
member.summary: A failure code generated by a user-defined, custom verification level.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.NotSet
member.summary: Unknown status, the verification may still be in progress.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnhandledException
member.summary: One or more unhandled exceptions have been thrown during the verification process. Additional information may be retrieved using the UnhandledExceptions property collection of the target VerificationStateBag.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.Success
member.summary: The email address has been verified successfully up to the required level.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnmatchedQuotedPair
member.summary: A quoted pair within a quoted word is not closed properly.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnexpectedQuotedPairSequence
member.summary: An unexpected quoted pair sequence has been found within a quoted word.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidWordBoundaryStart
member.summary: A new word boundary start has been detected at an invalid position.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidCharacterInSequence
member.summary: An invalid character has been detected in the provided sequence.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnbalancedCommentParenthesis
member.summary: The number of parenthesis used to open comments is not equal to the one used to close them.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DoubleDotSequence
member.summary: An invalid sequence of two adjacent dots has been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidLocalPartLength
member.summary: The local part of the e-mail address has an invalid length.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidFoldingWhiteSpaceSequence
member.summary: An invalid folding white space (FWS) sequence has been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.AtSignNotFound
member.summary: The at sign symbol (@), used to separate the local part from the domain part of the address, has not been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidEmptyQuotedWord
member.summary: An invalid quoted word with no content has been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidAddressLength
member.summary: The email address has an invalid total length.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainPartCompliancyFailure
member.summary: The domain part of the email address is not compliant with the IETF standards.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.IspSpecificSyntaxFailure
member.summary: The email address is not compliant with the additional syntax rules of the ISP which should eventually manage it.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.LocalPartIsWellKnownRoleAccount
member.summary: The local part of the email address is a well-known role account.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DnsQueryTimeout
member.summary: A timeout has occurred while querying the DNS server(s) for records about the e-mail address domain.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the DnsSendTimeout and the DnsReceiveTimeout properties values of the VerificationSettings class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DnsConnectionFailure
member.summary: Verification failed because of a socket connection error occurred while querying the DNS server.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainDoesNotExist
member.summary: The domain of the email address does not exist.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainIsMisconfigured
member.summary: The domain of the email address does not have any valid DNS record and couldn't accept messages from another host on the Internet.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainIsInexistent
member.summary: Obsolete enum field, superseded by .

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainIsWellKnownDea
member.summary: The email address is provided by a well-known disposable email address provider (DEA).

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailExchangerIsWellKnownDea
member.summary: The mail exchanger being tested is a well-known disposable email address provider (DEA).

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.SmtpConnectionTimeout
member.summary: A timeout has occurred while connecting to the mail exchanger which serves the e-mail address domain.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the SmtpConnectionTimeout property value of the VerificationSettings class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.SmtpConnectionFailure
member.summary: A socket connection error occurred while connecting to the mail exchanger which serves the e-mail address domain.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxDoesNotExist
member.summary: The mailbox for the e-mail address does not exist.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxConnectionFailure
member.summary: Obsolete enum field.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.LocalSenderAddressRejected
member.summary: The external mail exchanger rejected the address specified by the LocalSenderAddress property value of the VerificationSettings class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxValidationTimeout
member.summary: A timeout occurred while verifying the existence of the mailbox.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the MailboxInspectionTimeout value of the VerificationSettings class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxTemporarilyUnavailable
member.summary: The requested mailbox is temporarily unavailable. This is not an indicator that the mailbox actually exists but, often, a message sent by external mail exchangers with greylisting enabled. To complete the validation of the address you should re-process the verification with a small delay (usually 5-10 minutes), until the server answers with a different message.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.ServerDoesNotSupportInternationalMailboxes
member.summary: The external mail exchanger does not support international mailbox names. To support this feature, mail exchangers must comply with RFC 5336 and support and announce both the 8BITMIME and the UTF8SMTP protocol extensions.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.CatchAllValidationTimeout
member.summary: A timeout occurred while verifying fake e-mail address rejection for the mail server.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the CatchAllValidationTimeout value of the VerificationSettings class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.ServerIsCatchAll
member.summary: The external mail exchanger accepts fake, non existent, e-mail addresses; therefore the provided e-mail address MAY be inexistent too.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.CatchAllConnectionFailure
member.summary: A connection error occurred while verifying the external mail exchanger rejects inexistent e-mail addresses.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.HttpConnectionTimeout
member.summary: A timeout has occurred while connecting to the HTTP(s) server (web mail) which serves the e-mail address domain.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the HttpsConnectionTimeout property value of the VerificationSettings class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.HttpConnectionFailure
member.summary: A socket connection error occurred while connecting to the HTTP server (web mail) which serves the e-mail address domain.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.OperationCancelled
member.summary: The asynchronous e-mail address verification was cancelled by using the CancelRun(IAsyncResult) method.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.SmtpDialogError
member.summary: The external mail exchanger replied one or more non-standard SMTP lines and caused the SMTP session to be aborted.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.LocalEndPointRejected
member.summary: The external mail exchanger rejected the local endpoint, probably because of its own policy rules.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification
member.summary: Represents an email verification and its features, including the address to verify, the settings to support while performing the validation, and the state of the validation activity along with its results (if any).

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification.#ctor(System.String,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationSettings)
member.summary: Constructs a new email verification.
member.param: The email address to verify.
The set of features and options for this verification.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the email address verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification.InputData
member.summary: Gets the email address to verify in this verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification.Settings
member.summary: Gets the settings for this verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification.State
member.summary: Gets the state of this verification.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.SmtpDialogException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an unexpected SMTP reply from an external mail exchanger is detected.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.SmtpDialogException.Stage
member.summary: The stage of the SMTP dialog where the exception occurs.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.SmtpDialogException.Reply
member.summary: The SMTP reply which caused the exception to occur.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel
member.summary: Represents a verification level in the email validation pipeline.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Syntax
member.summary: Performs a syntactical validation of the email address against RFC 2821, RFC 2822, RFC 3696 and RFC 5321.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.RoleAccount
member.summary: Checks whether the local part of the email address is a well-known role account, like postmaster, abuse, sales, etc.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.IspSpecificSyntax
member.summary: Validates the email address against the specific syntactical rules of major Internet Service Providers.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.DeaDomain
member.summary: Checks the domain of the email address against an internal list of well known disposable e-mail address (DEA) providers.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Dns
member.summary: Queries the configured DNS server(s) and looks for records about the email address domain and checks their validity and consistency. The collection of the DNS server(s) the component can query may be inspected and adjusted using the DnsServers property of the VerificationSettings class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.DeaMailExchanger
member.summary: Checks the mail exchanger host against an internal list of well known disposable e-mail address (DEA) providers.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Smtp
member.summary: Checks if the mail exchanger responsible for the e-mail address can be contacted using the SMTP protocol.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Mailbox
member.summary: Checks if the mail exchanger responsible for the e-mail address actually recognizes it as a valid recipient.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.CatchAll
member.summary: Checks if the mail exchanger responsible for the e-mail address rejects invalid recipients.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new verification level, using the specified name. This members is useful in advanced scenarios where custom levels of validation are needed. To just use one of the built-in validation levels, please refer to the static properties this type exposes.
member.param: A custom string which identifies the verification level, for serialization purposes.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the validation level, useful in some serialization scenarios.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup
member.summary: Represents a group of related email address verifications.
member.remarks: This item is available only for the Enterprise Edition of the product.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of a verification group that is empty.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification})
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of a verification group that contains elements copied from the specified collection.
member.param: The collection of Verification whose elements are copied to the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.Add(Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification)
member.summary: Add an e-mail address verification task to the group.
member.param: The Verification to add to the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.AddRange(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification})
member.summary: Add the specified verifications to the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.Clear
member.summary: Removes all the e-mail address verification tasks contained in the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.Contains(Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified e-mail address verification task is contained in the group.
member.param: The Verification to look for, within the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.CopyTo(Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the e-mail address verification tasks contained in the group to a compatible one-dimension array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.Remove(Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification)
member.summary: Removes the specified e-mail address verification task from the group.
member.param: The Verification to remove.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the specified e-mail address verification task has been found and, subsequently, removed from the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.IndexOf(Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification)
member.summary: Searches for the specified e-mail address verification task and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the group.
member.param: The Verification to look for, within the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.Insert(System.Int32,Cobisi.EmailVerify.Verification)
member.summary: Inserts an e-mail address verification task into the group at the specified index.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the e-mail address verification task at the specified index, within the group.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the group.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.State
member.summary: Gets a property bag for the verification group, useful to store custom state details.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of e-mail address verification tasks contained in the group.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the group is read-only.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationGroup.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets an e-mail address verification task at the specified index, within the group.
